name: Key Hell
description:
Take control over a battle drone locked inside an enemy territor taking as many defending turrets, as you can, before losing control over the drone and letting go of all control.

An endless bullet hell arcade, where you gain score by surviving, killing enemies by touching them and finding upgrade bateries with granting you a new combat ability. But be aware, everytime a bullet hits you, you have to rebind your controls until you lose (almost) all keys on your keyboard!

This game is an entry to GMTK game jam 2020 with theme: Out of control.

WRITE YOUR SCORE IN THE COMMENTS!
